column5: AQMS very low volume this is a methodical take down
AQMS okay I agree but it comes down with a disarming ease its scary

AQMS For those who may be confused here I suggest rereading the CC transcript from three weeks ago I believe Cotton laid out a very reasonable and viable course of action for the remainder of this year I take great solace in the fact that Veolia is in the house and I do believe that they will achieve their objectives with regard to meeting the performance metrics for the Clarios deal and then further licensing A lot of upcoming catalyst and Cotton did say that we would receive updates Now would not be the time to sell IMO I believe a little more patience is warranted here as they work to synchronize plant ops with Veolia to support scaling to 16mods by EOY Personally Im holding my 377k shrs LT and could care less about daily volatility Im placing my bet on their success as Veolia wouldnt have signed on to a nonviable project IMOAqua Metals Inc AQMS CEO Steve Cotton on Q1 2019 Results Corporate Update Call Transcript AQMS seekingalphacomarticle42
